ResearchTabDef.label: Dead Man Switch
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Nara Industries spread technology to every planet they occupied, forcing native residents to complete a selection process to determine their compatability with their technology. Nara never stopped pursuing technological advancements during their operations. \n\nSome people say that the colonial fleets are several groups of industrial complexes controlled by AIs whom capable of interstellar traveling between galaxies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Foundational drone tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using simple sensors and transceivers to achieve simple but practical drone systems.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Hive network and drone warfare
subject->automata of the war
subject->lidar lock-on

subject_story->participated in a semiconductor industrial revolution at a midworld planet
subject_gerund->optimizing machine learning algorithms
subject_gerund->advocating for limits on autonomous weapons
subject_gerund->exploring the possibility of autonomous weapons

ResearchProjectDef.label: Material Engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using the power of extreme heat and pressure to obliterate impurities from steel and stone to create tungsteel alloy and military-grade ceramic plate.

rulesStrings.li: subject->emerging materials
subject->advanced materials
subject->military-grade materials

subject_story->calculated the alloy material ratio of high-strength materials through neutron number
subject_story->describes the influence of high pressure environment applied on material
subject_story->summarized the metal crystal phase prediction under gravity-free conditions
subject_story->experimented with gravity-free metal processing and contribute to materials science
subject_gerund->improving the production process
subject_gerund->calculating perfect material ratio
subject_gerund->testing the defensive performance of different materials against emerging thermal weapons

ResearchProjectDef.label: Artificial Fiber
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create polyster and plastifiber, manmade fabrics synthesized for their unique properties across multiple disciplines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automatroid Basis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automatroids are autonomous weapons capable of executing tactical missions without overseer intervals. \n\n These autonomous machines became commonplace as replacements or opponents for front-line infantry because the treaty in 2026 AD that was supposed to regulate its development was opposed by the major powers of the time.

rulesStrings.li: subject->autonomous Weapons
subject->Killer Robot
subject->automatroid
subject_story->predicted the consequences of a large number of unregulated loitering weapons are considerable
subject_story->discussed the contribution of pre-trained models to mechanical automation
subject_story->described the relationship between humans and drones is no longer just a relationship between tools and users
subject_story->condemned the rejection of the treaty in 2026 AD which intended to regulate the development of killer robots
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents before The Next Generation War
subject_gerund->participating in the technological iteration of autonomous robots
subject_gerund->reverse engineering from technical data from the decrypt data.
subject_gerund->reviewing the technical relevance between mechanoids and automatroids

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mecha Gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Mecha Gear" originated as a term for future machinery designs which were unobtainable with old technology. \n\nHowever a millenia of advancements in material construction has seen these previously unrealistic designs become feasible.

rulesStrings.li: subject->mecha gear
subject->from science fiction to practical engineering
subject->standing on the horizon
subject_story->explained the substantial optimization of the flexible self-locking structure for the durability of omnidirectional joints.
subject_story->summarized the improvement of reciprocating motion structures using electromagnetic bearings
subject_story->described how multi-level, nested cushioning gears absorb and reuse impact forces during high-intensity activities
subject_story->served as a military advisor in the military
subject_gerund->improving the production process
subject_gerund->working for an automatroid manufacturing complex
subject_gerund->piloting a heavy exoskeleton to operate military missions

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legion
ResearchProjectDef.description: This series of automatroids are designed for large-scale warfare. They have simple weapon control systems and can't wield heavy weapons, but ease of production and cheap costs leads to these units being the backbone of many automatroid gunnery lines.

rulesStrings.li: subject->metallic tide
subject->the marching tide
subject->Legion on march
subject_story->commanded a Legion company to defend the Zaporizhzhia energy center during the Third Europa War
subject_story->developed the doctrine of machine-armor coordination based on war experience
subject_story->recovered this technology from the buried ancient facility in a rimworld planet
subject_story->researching and optimizing this technology to make use of it
subject_story->obtained part of this technology during the encounter with outlaw militants
subject_gerund->operating a Legion task force
subject_gerund->serving as a commander in the war
subject_gerund->improving the production process

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neural Prosthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Neural prosthetics designed for disabled soldiers. They're durable and easily adapted to, requiring minimal training for the patient to become comfortable. However, due to the natural wear and tear of its mechanical components, these prosthetic replacements are not as efficient as their original flesh counterparts.

rulesStrings.li: subject->nerves-accessed
subject->artificial nerve
subject->bipedal machinery
subject_story->realized the vulnerability of human flesh in the battlefield
subject_story->provided medical care to the disabled by converting mechanical remain into prosthetic limbs
subject_story->lamented that humans had to transform themselves to adapt to the increasingly mechanized warfare
subject_story->lost most of body parts due to exploded bomb while scavenging at a battlefield site
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents before The Next Generation War
subject_gerund->making prosthetic surgery affordable for every disabled person in Rimworld
subject_gerund->helping every disabled person to stand up again
subject_gerund->providing battlefield medical guidance in the Colonial Fleet Humanitarian Support Organization

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dead Man's Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description:
The Dead Man's Switch is a failsafe mechanism intended to induce the self-halt sequence when the overseer is incapated. 

Researchers realized this failsafe mechanism not only solved the halted problem but also made artificial intelligence understand the meaning of death and self-preservation, which had significant ramifications for humanity.

Unlocks the construct of Decoy Antennas which will attract a group of rogue automatroids to the transponder.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Halted problem
subject->Solution unsolved
subject->bipedal machinery
subject_story->quoted algorithm engineer Yánzhi Jiang's overview: "Machines cannot judge whether they can get results within a limited time, and humans cannot either."
subject_story->completed the historical collection of Earth's Space era on a glitterworld
subject_story->participated in the Ordo Historia's investigation and research project on the Colonial Fleet
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents before The Next Generation War
subject_gerund->reinventing this technology by investigating ancient databases
subject_gerund->thinking about the meaning of lifeform and the loneliness of mankind
subject_gerund->exploring human possibilities and how to avoid repeating past mistakes of mechanoid again

ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Some advanced automatroids require specific parts which are only manufactured in low gravity environments.\n\nColonial High Command turns a blind eye to attracting and destroying their rogue automatroids which will contain the components required for further progression.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Artificial Muscle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Artifuscle is a type of prosthetic material made from genetically enhanced lab grown muscle-fiber bundles. Artifuscle made its rounds in military and civilian markets, and it didn't take long for military developers to realize the future of mechanical-biological hybrid weapons.

rulesStrings.li: subject->bio-machine symbiosis
subject->nerves and wiring
subject->biological machinery
subject_story->analyzed this technology in depth and received a severe warning from the Colonial Fleet
subject_story->achieved artificial synthesis of life under limited conditions by reverse engineering the technology
subject_story->completed the historical collection of Earth's Space era on a glitterworld
subject_story->participated in the Ordo Historia's investigation and research project on the Colonial Fleet
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents before The Next Generation War

subject_gerund->thinking about the blurred line between organic and mechanic
subject_gerund->investigating hidden truth the Colonial Fleet tried hard to conceal behind this technology

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pioneer Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uniforms and equipment designed for humans, mainly for civilian use and emergency survival situations. Includes basic uniforms and firearms typically handled by militamen and colonists alike.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cluster Transceiver
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cluster transceivers are a way to control robots in a battlespace. Mechanical units that have obtained self-awareness as a result of a Dead Man Switch have been noted to resist directives provided by these transceivers.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cluster control
subject->harmony of cluster behavior
subject->grand mechanized theory
subject_story->participated in the Ordo Historia's investigation and research project on the Colonial Fleet
subject_story->believes that developing drone autonomy is the key to breaking away from the tool-like relationship between humans and machines and unlocking their potential
subject_story->recreated the technology based on a recovered Sakalava colony
subject_story->realizing long-distance anti-interference control through artificially induced psychic reactions
subject_story->discovered that machines controlled by psychic reactions would retain part of the consciousness of the operator
subject_gerund->recovering ancient autonomous weapons
subject_gerund->reverse engineering from ancient technology
subject_gerund->exploring the relationship between collectivity and autonomy

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defense Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Equipment designed for humans and automatroids. Its a step above the survivalist equipment Pioneers are issued with better tolerances and quality in its designs. This equipment is better suited for defensive operations due to its limited range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Military Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: This equipment is primarily designed for automatroid use, as its too heavy to operate by an unaugemented human. It consists of heavy weapons and breaching tools as well as high caliber defense platforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Heavy duty firepower designed for the largest of automatroids. This gear is too heavy to be operated by smaller automatroid units and consists of fire supremacy solutions sure to turn the tide of any war they're introduced to. Includes high caliber autocannons, anti-tank guns, and defense platforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Battle Friends
ResearchProjectDef.description: Due to a clerical ereror, its undetermined if the proper term for these machines is "battle frames" or "battle friends"- They're automatroids outfitted with exoskeleton frames which are customizable to fit the needs of the operator. They are useful in combat and in the mundane operations of day to day colony life.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hybird Engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: The establishment of biological-mechanical hybrid technology during World War III saw independent mercenaries establish create a sovereign state with personnel using drones and hybrid prosthetics. Their forces consisted of discared wounded veterans who returned to fight for their cause due to the advances in biomechanical engineering and prothesis. They also developed a munition that rendered the advanced charged ammuniton of the worlds' armies inert.\n\nAfter their eventual slaughter, their creation of a Blaster Screen Shell remained as their only legacy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biosynthetic Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the advances in robotic and bionic engineering, biological-mechanical hybrid technology has became feasible. Unlocks biosynthetic arms and legs, as well as the serum required to aid in the body accepting such a replacement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Organ Replacement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of Nutrition Ports and Sensory Filters which allow for the dulling of emotional feelings and a streamlining of the nutritional intake process. While these are certainly more efficient than their organic counterpart, what is lost forever in the pursuit of ultimate efficiency?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wetware Hypothesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: After the discovery of the Dead Man's Switch, an AI algorithm engineer Yánzhi Jiang proposed a hypothetical solution to the halting problem. \n\n Wetware was created as a proof of concept, serving as an organic brain activated in a series with the Dead Man's Switch enabling Automatroids to awaken and continue fighting after their operator has disabled. Preliminary tests indicated a portion of the operator's personality was transposed into the Automatroid- but such reports dissapeared as quickly as they were made. Allows for the construction of Decoy Radars and heavier Automatroids, as well as the synthesis of Wetware Computers.

rulesStrings.li: subject->in short Hypothesis
subject->the solution
subject->wetware machinery

subject_story->quoted algorithm engineer Yánzhi Jiang's overview: "The meaning of life is carrying information of its iteration, information about genes and traits, reaction to the environment, and mindless thoughts on everything"
subject_story->analyzed this technology in depth and received a severe warning from the Colonial Fleet
subject_story->achieved artificial synthesis of life under limited conditions by reverse engineering the technology
subject_story->learned about a method to mass produce wetware through biological cultivation
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents before The Next Generation War
subject_gerund->escaping from the pursuit and assassination of countless colonial fleets
subject_gerund->thinking about the blurred line between organic and mechanic
subject_gerund->investigating hidden truth the Colonial Fleet tried hard to conceal behind this technology

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Automatroid
ResearchProjectDef.description: These massive machines were purpose built for full-scale warfare amongst nations. Unlocks various assault Automatroids which took inspiration from old-war vehicles and technology, but with a modernized twist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Humanoid Engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: During the early wars, Automatroids with human shapes were shown to be effective at demoralizing human combatants and inflicting psychological trauma upon enemies lines. This lead to the development of a series of Automatroids deemed the Arquebusier Models.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Peacekeepers
ResearchProjectDef.description: A series of Arquebusier model Automatroids designed for urban warfare, these models boast heavy armor, lightning fast mobility, and a punishing array of compatible weaponry. This line of Automatroids excel in urban environments and close quarters combat, but can also work as less lethal peacekeepers and riot control units.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Next-Gen Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Weapons development centered around biomechanical hybrids continued until World War IV, where it had reached incomprehensible heights.\n\nThis was the beginning of the next-generation weapons that would ultimately lead to the destruction of the planet. Unlocks the Tarbosaurus, a fearsome predatory Automatroid shaped after the mighty carnotaurus capable of hosting enough firepower to destroy entire cities if left unchecked.
